data.title: Obituary for Robert Nelson Cupp
data.meta_description: Obituary for Robert Cupp | Morristown, TN | Robert Nelson Cupp, age...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Robert Nelson Cupp | Stetzer-Bales Funeral Home
data.text:
Robert Nelson Cupp, age 62, of Morristown, passed away Friday, March 12, 2021 at Morristown-Hamblen Healthcare System.

He is preceded in death by his daughter, Amy Lee Cupp ; parents, Charles William and Ora Lee Cupp; sisters, Pam, Corda, Irene, and Patricia; brother, Jr Cup.

He is survived by his wife, Christal Cupp; daughters, Kristy Lee Claiborne; Jessica Cupp, and Kimberly Kay; brother, Billy Cupp; grandchildren, James and Courtney Claiborne.

The family will receive friends Wednesday, March 17, 2021 from 6-7 P.M. in the chapel of Stetzer-Bales Funeral Home. A funeral service will follow at 7:00 P.M.

Arrangements by Stetzer-Bales Funeral Home.
